author: Kitty Greenwald
title: A More Tender Meatball: Frenchette’s Flawless Recipe
text:
For 25 years, Lee Hanson and Riad Nasr somehow kept a low profile cooking together in such major-league Manhattan restaurants as Balthazar and Minetta Tavern. In early March they’ll open a hotly anticipated place of their own.
At Frenchette, in Tribeca, the chefs promise personal takes on the classic French cooking they’ve perfected over decades. These lamb meatballs in a spicy tomato sauce, their second Slow Food Fast recipe, provide a prime example. “Ricotta lightens these up tremendously,” said Mr. Hanson. After searing...
